item.title: Dynamic horizontal header part 2: flexible horizontal scrolling
item.description:
In Excel we are quite familiar with a the functionality to freeze a row and a column. In Power App Canvas this can be more challenging. In this blog serie of two blogs a solution for Power Apps will be explained.

  1. The first blog the setup to create a header and nested galleries are explained
  2. This (second) blog shows how to create a dynamic horizontal scrolling header.

Set up

See blog part 1 to have the setup in which the basic of the three galleries are created.

Context
